price: 21. (Zij zijn) dood, levenloos en zij weten niet wanneer zij zullen herrijzen.
arabic: أَمۡوَٰتٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡيَآءٖۖ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: amwātun ghayru aḥyāin wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
